title: Sri Lanka appoints FOUR spokespersons for Cabinet
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lankan Government has appointed four ministers as spokespersons for the Cabinet.
Minister Bandula Gunawardena was appointed as the Cabinet Spokesperson on Monday (23).
Ministers Kanchana Wijesekera, Mahinda Amaraweera, and Manusha Nanayakkara were appointed as the Joint Cabinet Spokesperson.
Sri Lanka increases fuel prices after Cabinet approves pricing formula
